content:
Yeah, cycling definitely makes me more aware of my surroundings. I've been noticing a lot of street art and murals in some of the neighborhoods I've been riding through, which is really cool. And, of course, the coffee shops are a great bonus!

Actually, I just discovered a really great coffee shop near the waterfront that I'd recommend. It's called "The Daily Grind" and it's got a great atmosphere and amazing coffee. I've been stopping there on my way to work a few times a week.

As for landmarks, there's a really cool pier that I've been riding past that has great views of the bay and the city skyline. I've also seen some signs for a bike path that runs along the waterfront and goes out to a nearby island, which I'm planning to check out soon.
